comments: Inverse permutation to A050000: a(A050000(n)) = A050000(a(n)) = n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (elemIndex)import Data.Maybe (fromJust)a050001 n = (fromJust $ elemIndex n a050000_list) + 1-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 13 2011
author: _Clark Kimberling_
